reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything I needed in a set of earbuds
reviews.reviewText: SO. It all started the other day when my favorite earbuds of 7 years finally kicked the bucket. They had come to me bundled with an old phone purchase, and to my despair, were discontinued/out of stock everywhere. I was desperate to find a replacement but nothing out there seemed to fulfill the basic features I was looking for, namely: a 90 degree headphone jack, volume and microphone support, and a durable braided cord covering.In come these earphones from LUDOS! This design had precisely everything that I wanted out of a set of earbuds plus change. The 90 degree jack is personally a HUGE win for me and the chief reason why I chose these over the original Clamor. I'm loving the easy-to-operate volume slider and the magnets that help keep the earbuds together. The foam tips are comfy and the sound quality is great. Absolutely worth it for the price!I was a little confused since I couldn't find this updated model on the LUDOS website, but I guess it hasn't been added yet because it's a new listing. Really hoping that more colors are planned for this model - I would love to get this in the grey or gold that the original Clamor is available in. This time I'm going to make sure to get backups! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value that's music to your ears.
reviews.reviewText: These are something else. I was looking for something small and wired for my laptop so I didn't have to lug around my large Sonys in my laptop bag.After doing some searching I came across these and they ticked all the boxes. Small, inline mic, and inexpensive. Now I don't claim to be a headphone master or audiophile but what I can say is for the price, you're getting a lot of value. The first thing I noticed is the overall build quality. Nice, fabric wrapped wire that feels durable. The inline mic is pretty standard for earbuds of this type but otherwise no complaints from anyone that they can't hear me. Something I really like is the fact that they're magnetic. This should in theory keep them from getting too tangled in your pocket or gym bag. Speaking of which they also include a decent little bag to keep them in.But how do they sound? For the price? Superb. Deep lows and bright highs. Subjective, but I'd recommend playing with your EQ a bit to get them sounding just right. Out of the box they still sound fantastic. And the addition of a volume slider on the inline mic is nice.Something else that makes these unique is the use of memory foam for the actual ear plug. They're very comfy and come with an assortment of sizes for all different ears. I have the yellow set pictured (Others in the package are black).So you want something wired to keep in the desk, gym bag or even just for casual listening? Give these a try. Amazing for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works most of the time - review after seven months of use
reviews.reviewText: Generally works, but a couple of things to note- Wire build is strong and good value for the price, does not tangle- General in-year fit and noise cancellation not as good as a set of Amazon headphones I purchased five years ago for the same price- Microphone works in somewhat noisy environments as long as you put the mic against your mouth. Useful for taking calls remotely say from a cafe with ambient noise.- They're my primary set of wired work headphones now.- Not great for listening to music - the stereo effect is mediocre.- Good for both Mac and PC

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value and good sound. Not very durable.
reviews.reviewText: I gave this as a gift to my son since his favorite ear buds are broken and are no longer being made by Sony. This actually sounded good and my son liked these ear buds. Unfortunately, one earbud is no longer working. The mic and one of the one earbud is still working. I was hoping these would last at least a year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is best earbuds that I ever had
reviews.reviewText: I love these unfortunately I lost it twice but guess what I bought it again twice because these are great you know very good sound they are loud they have adjustments for volume and skipping it's great definitely worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not quite working for me.
reviews.reviewText: The good: pretty decent sound quality, nice volume control slider, several size optional earbuds to try.The bad: the memory foam earbuds that came installed, and which I’d hoped meant they’d fit and stay in my ears well, were too big for me. (Do I have small earholes? I don’t think so but maybe.) Installing one of the other options was difficult but once done, I found with effort I could squeeze them into my ears. Not ideal but worth a try — time to go for a run. That’s when I discovered the controls aren’t compatible with my Shuffle — thought I was getting play/pause, fwd & rev controls but no, just volume slider and a button that did nothing (answer calls? I don’t need that, it’s a Shuffle).Now for the grumpy: why is it so damn hard to find headphones for my Shuffle? I have headphones I like but they have no controls, so I’ve been using a Belkin dongle to patch that in; worked fine until it didn’t, a loose wire or something = sound cutting out in one ear. Went to replace that and…$35 for a wee dongle?? C’mon, Belkin, get real. Ridiculous, I guess my old Etymotics are due for retirement (too bad b/c these have very thin, long tubes that fit well into the ear canals, with soft silicone grips to keep them in place — but no controls). Apple earbuds have the controls I need but quality is not commensurate with price, and they fall out of your ears easily.The search continues…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wow, I was not expecting how good they are at filtering out background noise. I had been using the headphones that came with my phone years ago and they just died. These came with a good range of options for tips. They fit great and the volume is amazing. I like that the cord is not the silicone or plastic stuff, maybe it'll survive being chewed on by my cats...or kids. Great quality, comfortable, and great sound. The tips do take a bit of effort to change out but I know the tips aren't going to fall or slide off easily.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound and noise cancellation for the price point.
reviews.reviewText: This is my first review on amazon and I buy a lot of stuff. Rope style chord is the best only way to go. The sound is so much better than expected, I'm playing Wu-Tang as I write this amd the base is great. Their comfortable, I can shake my head and they dont fall out. I'm 5' from my TV and March Madness is on and I've got the volume on "I'm doing chores around the apartment and want to hear the game". I can't hear the TV at all.Would have been 5 stars across the board but I'm not sure I will like the volume slider and I can't speak to the mic, which for me is crucial and I can't speak to durability. Will update.
Muchisimas gracias, es un producto de gran calidad y a la empresa le importa. Además me mandaron un extra de regalo. Gracias!!

Costo un pó alto ma ben meritato, il cavo in nylon é resistente a tagli e strappi, i cuscinetti sono quelli che mi hanno sorpreso di piú: molto morbidi, fatti di gommapiuma che si adattano bene alla forma del canale aricuolare e che quindi non scivolano!Qualità audio buona, peró fanno fatica con le alte frequenze che non rendono un output pulito. Microfono nella media ma per 17 euro ci sta.
Je l’utilise avec mon iPhone prise Jack, il fonctionne très bien et il est design .
Köpte lurarna för att dom hade skumpropp. Besviken att medföljande storlekar var en helt annan modell.(Silikon, Dåligt)
